title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 43-2.7 - Harvest restrictions; ocean quahogs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 43-2.7 - Harvest restrictions; ocean quahogs

State Regulations
(a) No vessel may be used to harvest more
than 14 standard cages of ocean quahogs (equivalent to 448 industry standard
bushels) in any one day. (b) It
shall be unlawful for any person to exceed the harvest restrictions set forth
in this section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
43-2.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
